msg: SOLR-4518: Improved CurrencyField error messages when attempting to use a Currency that is not supported by the current JVM (merge r1451931)

author: markt
msg: When decoding URIs we always have the full input available. Ensure partial / invalid bytes at the end of the URI trigger an error.
